dict.acceptation: 复杂难懂的；与他人有密切关系的；受牵扯的；作为一部份参与的；
表明（某人参与了罪行等）(involve的过去式和过去分词)；使参与；牵涉；使专心于；

sent.orig: Cerebellar white-matter was severely involved, but the grey-matter nucleus were not involved.
sent.trans: 以小脑半球白质受累最为严重，但其灰质核团未见受累。

sent.orig: Get Involved Sometimes getting involved in an activity can take your mind off your problems.
sent.trans: 参与有时候参与一种活动能让你忘却烦恼。

sent.orig: Retinal vasculitis is always involved retinal vein retinal artery is involved less.
sent.trans: 视网膜血管炎主要累及青壮年视网膜静脉，动脉累及较少，致盲率较高。

sent.orig: To be frank, I'd rather you were not involved in the case.
sent.trans: 坦率的说，我宁愿你没有卷入这个案子里。

sent.orig: Mr. Annan says the UN should be involved in the effort in Iraq.
sent.trans: 联合国应该介入伊拉克的重建工作。
